channel.title: blood on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in blood on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Lins car hit by motorbike guys shoulder
item.description: 22:47 Wednesday 11 October 2017 JST I am at a hospital with Lin after a little fender bender involving a guy’s shoulder hitting her mirror hard enough to cut her hand as the glass shattered into her open window. The police officer came and suggested it will be easiest/cheapest overall if they don’t sue each other and just do 50⁄50 blame and call it in to their respective insurance companies.

item.title: second time I gave blood in Japan
Headed to M's baby shower
item.description: 11:35 Sunday 15 November 2015 JST Lin’s driving, and I’m going to work on my computer in the passenger’s seat. Huh. This car turns off its engine each time we come to a full stop.

item.title: can't give blood within four weeks of being abroad
item.description: 16:28 Thursday 12 November 2015 JST bah. Had I gone before my OZ trip, I’d (likely) have been accepted, and would have finished nearly a month of the 3 month countdown between donations.
